game.name: Train Simulator: BNSF Locomotive Pack Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Three classic Electro-Motive second-generation diesels – the best-selling SD40-2, versatile GP38-2, and iconic F45 – in Burlington Northern and BNSF liveries are ready for Train Simulator service in this remarkable pack.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Three classic Electro-Motive second-generation diesels – the best-selling SD40-2, versatile GP38-2, and iconic F45 – in Burlington Northern and BNSF liveries are ready for Train Simulator service in this remarkable pack.
